description: Muscular hunk Connor Halstead is an undercover cop who needs some help with his investigation, so he enlists fellow officer, chiseled Beaux Banks to show him a few things. Dark-haired Connor tries to seduce tattooed Beaux, but he fails miserably! It’s up to Beaux to show him how it’s really done as he takes the lead, grinding his bubble butt on Connor’s throbbing member, and undressing him so he can get his slobbering tongue on that big dick.
title: The Sting Part 1
